adHeader: Suffering From REALTOR Letdown? I Can Help You Regain Your Confidence!
adDetails: If you have suffered from "REALTOR letdown" in the past, don't let that stop you from giving me a call when you are thinking about selling your Bay Area home. Did you know that homes sold with a REALTOR average a 20-25 percent higher sales price than those sold without a REALTOR? That's real money! Gain your advantage today with no obligation and give me a call. In the mean time, enjoy this quarterly real estate sales activity analysis of Atherton and feel welcome to call me with any questions you may have on your Silicon Valley neighborhood. I look forward to talking with you and hearing your home's unique story. "You deserve my exceptional real estate acumen and negotiation expertise on your side," Bill Curry Broker, Access Real Estate Board of Directors, San Mateo County Association of REALTORS (SAMCAR) Copy and paste for our office website: http://AccessRealEstateSanCarlos.com
